title: Bug 17228weird Tree selection behaviour
description: F1 on linuxgtk:1) open java browsing perspective2) click on org.apache.xerces3) click on javax.xml.parsers4) (sometimes) observe that the types are not populated5) click on org.apache.html.dom6) (sometimes) observe that now both javax.xml.parsers andorg.apache.html.dom are selected.This is not always reproducible, but it happens about 1 out of 2 times I trythis. It seems that somehow there's an invisible multiselection going on.This doesn't happen on w2k.
